text: KBYB (101.7 FM, "Hot FM") is a radio station broadcasting a country music format. Licensed to Hope, Arkansas, United States, it serves the Texarkana area. The station is currently owned by Texarkana Radio Center Licenses, LLC. ==History== On May 28, 2013, KBYB changed their format from adult hits (as "Bob FM") to country, branded as "101.7 Hot FM".KBYB Brings Hot Country to Texarkana ==Translator== ==References== ==External links== BYB Category:Country radio stations in the United States Category:Radio stations established in 1993 Category:1993 establishments in Arkansas
title: KBYB
